entry.tran: 柑橘属水果(如橘子、柠檬、西柚)
entry.def: A citrus fruit is a juicy fruit with a sharp taste such as an orange, lemon, or grapefruit.

means.word_mean: 1. any of numerous fruits of the genus Citrus having thick rind and juicy pulp; grown in warm regions
2. any of numerous tropical usually thorny evergreen trees of the genus Citrus having leathery evergreen leaves and widely cultivated for their juicy edible fruits having leathery aromatic rinds
